XXL.Chess.GameObject.chessPieces

Class ChessPiece

  • java.lang.Object
    • XXL.Chess.GameObject.chessPieces.ChessPiece
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Amazon, ArchBishop, Bishop, Camel, Chancellor, King, Knight, KnightKing, Pawn, Queen, Rook

    public abstract class ChessPiece
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameObject
    Abstract class representing a chess piece.
